messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our omnipotence, we believe that one of the station's animals/bots has developed [REDACTED] level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: In accordance with ssspacelaw, Donovan Thomssson isss sssentanced to death by plasssma for two countsss of attempted murder and one count of  attempted sssubversssion of a ssslaved borg.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to S.S Nooleus. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Someone is hacking all the fucking airlocks

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Janitor Felix Marssshal isss being awarded a dissstinguissshed conduct medal for freeing me when I wasss trapped in a burning area

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.
